name: buildwithclaude (davepoon)
description: [项目级] A single hub to find Claude Skills, Agents, Commands, Hooks, Plugins, and Marketplace collections to extend Claude Code, Claude Desktop, Agent SDK and OpenClaw。来源: https://github.com/davepoon/buildwithclaude

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A single hub to find Claude Skills, Agents, Commands, Hooks, Plugins, and Marketplace collections to extend Claude Code, Claude Desktop, Agent SDK and OpenClaw

来源: https://github.com/davepoon/buildwithclaude
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 2453

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Browse all plugin types with filtering
- Search across plugins, agents, commands, hooks, skills
- Copy install commands with one click
- View full documentation and usage examples
- Discover MCP servers and community plugins
